description.name: pepeerc20
description.tagline: PEPE Token erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-pepe Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PEPE Token erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/pepe receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/pepe wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
